Text.Name: BaseExpect1
Text.Desc: Multiple days on the run really leaves one exhausted, but it's better than being dead...
Text.StoryDesc: Escaping from that disaster was a stroke of luck

Text.Name: BaseExpect2
Text.Desc: Even though there's nothing here, but it's worlds better than the chaos outside.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing safe as it is far from that chaos

Text.Name: BaseExpect3
Text.Desc: It seems like you've all grown to like this place. There's no war nor taxes, and although things are a bit difficult, but the situation is livable. Could this be a new beginning? Everyone is full of hope.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling not unusual to secretly hope for a new beginning

Text.Name: BedroomExpect1
Text.Desc: Is this place even fit for humans to live?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that These kinds of conditions make tempers flare easily

Text.Name: BedroomExpect2
Text.Desc: This environment is frightening to say the least. Sleeping out in the wilderness would probably be more comfortable.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling not difficult to complain about such living conditions

Text.Name: BedroomExpect3
Text.Desc: These conditions are basically only good for sheltering one from the wind and the rain.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling easy not to be happy when having to put up with such crude conditions

Text.Name: BedroomExpect4
Text.Desc: This room is pretty standard in every way.
Text.StoryDesc: thinking thatHow could this room be improved

Text.Name: BedroomExpect5
Text.Desc: The room's not bad.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that This room is quite comfortable

Text.Name: BedroomExpect6
Text.Desc: Whoever designed and arranged this room really put some thought into it.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that This room is really quite nice

Text.Name: BedroomExpect7
Text.Desc: They really went all out with this room.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that This room is fantastic!

Text.Name: BedroomExpect8
Text.Desc: I need a room!
Text.StoryDesc: feeling easy to be pissed when you don't even have a room to your name

Text.Name: IndependentRoomNeed
Text.Desc: The outer disciples are proving more of a distraction than anything else... I hope to move out of this living situation soon.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that Living with the outer disciples is vexing

Text.Name: LiveWithBadMan
Text.Desc: [TXT] and I really aren't even able to be conducting practice in the same room.
Text.StoryDesc: Engaging in practice in a room with someone that one isn't very familiar with is vexing

Text.Name: BedroomFengShuiExpect1
Text.Desc: The Feng shui where I live is no where near ideal.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that Deficient Feng shui can really get on one's nerves

Text.Name: BedroomFengShuiExpect2
Text.Desc: This place where I live is just not lucky, is it really all right to live here?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that There's something wrong with the Feng shui here and it's setting everything off kilter

Text.Name: BedroomFengShuiExpect3
Text.Desc: The Feng shui here is so bad that this room is unlivable.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that There's something so wrong with the Feng shui here that it makes anyway in the room upset

Text.Name: BedroomFengShuiExpect4
Text.Desc: The Feng shui in my room really isn't half bad.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that Good Feng shui really lifts one's spirits

Text.Name: BedroomFengShuiExpect5
Text.Desc: The Feng shui in my room is pretty great, whoever arranged this room really knew what they were doing.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that A room with great Feng shui is enjoyable by all

Text.Name: BedroomExpect9
Text.Desc: Man, this room is so cramped!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that A cramped room can really get on one's nerves

Text.Name: BedroomExpect10
Text.Desc: This room is just desolate.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that A barren room needs to be fixed

Text.Name: ClosedRoom
Text.Desc: Where's the door!? I'm trapped!!!
Text.StoryDesc: Realizing that a room has no door causes one to bristle with anger

Text.Name: ClothesExpect1
Text.Desc: Do I really not have any clothing better than this? (Quality less than 30)
Text.StoryDesc: feeling hard to be satisfied with such terrible clothing

Text.Name: ClothesExpect2
Text.Desc: This clothing really suits me.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that Such suitable clothing really puts a smile on the wearer's face

Text.Name: ClothesExpect3
Text.Desc: This set of clothing isn't just comfortable, but it looks great to boot.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that Wearing such fine clothing really adds a radiance to the wearer's face

Text.Name: BeautyExpect1
Text.Desc: This environment is hideous. Not even a beggar would be willing to stay here.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that Such an atrocious environment easily puts a look of disgust on any face

Text.Name: BeautyExpect2
Text.Desc: How is this place so messy and filthy?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that Such a filthy environment really gets on one's nerves

Text.Name: BeautyExpect3
Text.Desc: The scenery here isn't half bad.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that Such ordinary scenery is at least not discomforting

Text.Name: BeautyExpect4
Text.Desc: Such comforting scenery really is a feast for the eyes.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling easy to lose oneself in such unique scenery

Text.Name: BeautyExpect5
Text.Desc: Scenery this beautiful is difficult to come find in this world.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling difficult not to appreciate such incredible scenery

Text.Name: BeautyExpect6
Text.Desc: Is this Heaven?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that This heavenly landscape entrances any who happen upon it

Text.Name: NeedFabao
Text.Desc: How can on proceed down the Law to Immortality without an artifact?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that Not having an artifact leaves one dissatisfied

Text.Name: NeedWeapon
Text.Desc: I need a weapon to protect myself.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that Not having a weapon is unsafe

Text.Name: Jingguai_HappyHuman
Text.Desc: I...I became a human? I've finally become human!!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeing that Delighted for having transformed into a human
